Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Interface AcceptsSupplies

All Known Subinterfaces:
LeaderAbility
All Known Implementing Classes:
Depot, DepotsManager, DevelopmentCard, Developments, DevelopmentSpace, Discount, Market, MutableProduction, Paycheck, Producer, Production, ProductionManager, SupplyContainer, Warehouse
public interface AcceptsSupplies
The interface describes an object that can store supplies. Said object must be able to receive a supply, remove a supply and tell the user if the addition/removal of a supply is allowed without actually performing such addition/removal.

  • Method Details

    • addSupply

      default void addSupply​(WarehouseObjectType wot) throws SupplyException, NoSuchMethodException, LeaderException
      Adds the supply to the storage. Beforehand the corresponding additionAllowed method is called to check if the operation can be performed.
      Parameters:
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The container cannot accept the supply
      NoSuchMethodException - More information needed to store the supply
      LeaderException

    • clearSupplies

      Pair<SupplyContainer,​SupplyContainer> clearSupplies() throws NoSuchMethodException
      Removes all of the supplies.
      Returns:
      A pair of SupplyContainer containing the removed supplies. The first element contains supplies from the depots, the second one supplies from the strongbox.
      Throws:
      NoSuchMethodException

    • clearSupplies

      default Pair<SupplyContainer,​SupplyContainer> clearSupplies​(DepotID slot) throws NoSuchMethodException
      Removes all of the supplies in the specified storage.
      Parameters:
      slot - Storage to clear.
      Returns:
      A pair of SupplyContainer containing the removed supplies. The first element contains supplies from the depots, the second one supplies from the strongbox.
      Throws:
      NoSuchMethodException
